name: Iso8601_type
documentation: Abstract ancestor type of ISO 8601 types, defining interface for 'extended' and 'partial' concepts from ISO 8601.

value.name: value
value.documentation: Representation of all descendants is a single String.

is_partial.name: is_partial
is_partial.documentation: True if this date time is partial, i.e. if trailing end (right hand) value(s) is/are missing.

is_extended.name: is_extended
is_extended.documentation: True if this ISO8601 string is in the 'extended' form, i.e. uses `'-'` and / or `':'` separators. This is the preferred format.
